title: She Was Sent by God - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Couple Growth   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Past Plays a Big Role   Second Chance   Stoic Characters   Strong Love Interests   Time Travel
author: 신서록
description:
She believed he was a heartless husband and treated him badly.

Until he was hunted down as a traitor in order to protect her.

‘My wife. Please be in good health.’

My heart was torn to pieces as I knelt before his severed arm.

Even now. But this time I could see that his body was clearly intact.

“Princess? Why are you crying all of a sudden?”

She had returned after losing hope. To the first night of their wedding three years ago.

“You must be nervous about your first night. Don’t worry. I didn’t plan to spend the night with the princess anyways.”

“Why? I’m your bride and the wedding is over. Now, let’s take off our clothes and go to bed.”

“…Princess?”

I tugged at his arm with force.

I’m not leaving you this time. I will protect you for sure, and I’ll die with you if I fail to do so.

Not as Nirisu’s princess but your wife, Agnes Arpad.

She pledged with determination.>
